Articles.Content: EXAMINE room.
You notice A big red button, a big green button, a leaver and a ladder
Press Big Red Button

You press the big red button, suddenly klaxon's sound and lights flash all around you as the stations radar dishes spin around and a huge screen comes to life on he wall, you can see all of Kerbols planets waiting for you to visit them!
Press the "TERMINATE" button.
There are no craft to terminate at this time.
Jeb, press all the buttons!
The dishes start rotating.. and rotating... and suddenly they hit 88 MPH, and you are back at the launchpad, ready to go to the tracking station, the SPH or VAB.
Enter VAB.
A ridicoulous firework rocket take all the place and rusty rocket parts are lying around.
Build Mun rocket.

The engineers begin to build a rocket, and in no time, you have the explody wonderful Mun Rocket MK1!

>Launch Rocket

>Build again

>Scrap rocket

>Exit VAB
Launch rocket.
Rocket explodes.
Insert coin?
You come up with a screen. You can either go back to the space center, revert to the launch or VAB.
Revert to the VAB, build a new rocket.

Not-so-explody-rocket-mk2

built and on the launchpad!

>Launch rocket

>Go back to VAB
Launch rocket!
engage smart A.S.S.
Sorry, this universe simulator supports only vanilla installations
The rickety rocket launches straight up, you are in the command pod, it is shaking, exits are south.
Exit south. (Whee!)

You are holding on for all you are worth to a few badly welded steel bars someone thought were vaguely ladder shaped, the air rushes past your head as the ground falls away from you, everything looks so small from up here.

Can I post two commands? If so:

Enter rocket North.

Begin gravity turn.
